framed.io_utils package¶

Submodules¶

framed.io_utils.plaintext module¶

This module implements methods for reading and writing models from a plain text format.

@author: Daniel Machado

framed.io_utils.plaintext.add_reaction_from_str(model, reaction_str)¶

Parse a reaction from a string and add it to the model.

Parameters:
  • model – Model – model
  • reaction_str – str – string representation a the reaction
framed.io_utils.plaintext.read_model_from_file(filename, kind=None)¶

Reads a model from a file.

Parameters:
  • filename – str – file path
  • kind – None or ‘cb’ – define kind of model to read (optional)
Returns:

Model – simple model or subclass
framed.io_utils.plaintext.write_model_to_file(model, filename)¶

Writes a model to a file.

Parameters:
  • model – Model – Model (or CBModel)
  • filename – str – file path

framed.io_utils.sbml module¶

This module implements methods for reading and writing SBML files.

@author: Daniel Machado

framed.io_utils.sbml.load_cbmodel(filename, flavor=None, apply_fixes=True)¶
framed.io_utils.sbml.load_odemodel(filename)¶
framed.io_utils.sbml.load_sbml_model(filename, kind=None, flavor=None)¶

Loads a metabolic model from a file.

Parameters:
  • filename – String – SBML file path
  • kind – {None (default), CB_MODEL, ODE_MODEL} – define kind of model to load (optional)
Returns:

Model – Simple model or respective subclass
framed.io_utils.sbml.parse_gpr_rule(rule)¶
framed.io_utils.sbml.save_cbmodel(model, filename, flavor='cobra')¶
framed.io_utils.sbml.save_sbml_model(model, filename, flavor=None)¶

Save a model to an SBML file.

Parameters:
  • model – Model (or any subclass) – model
  • filename – String – SBML file path

Module contents¶

Package implementing all I/O methods for reading and writing models.

@author: Daniel Machado
